and how questions 
let's proced then
--- Jim Cheesman <jchees@...> wrote:
> I'm willing to help out with a FAQ for this mailing
> list: though I can't 
> promise I'll do all of it ;)
> 
> Here's my proposal for a list of topics; I can
> already see various items 
> that I can't answer (I don't do extreme programming,
> I don't use an ide...)
> 
> 
> Junit FAQ v0.0.1
> 
> 1 The Basics
> 1.1 What is Junit?
> 1.2 What is unit testing? Functional testing?
> 1.3 What is black/white box testing?
> 1.4 What is extreme programming? "Test first"
> programming?
> 1.5 What are the limitations of Junit?
> 
> 2 Installation
> 2.1 What do I need?
> 2.2 Where can I get it?
> 2.3 How do I integrate this with ant?
> 
> 2.4 IDE Integration
> 2.4.1 Netbeans
> 2.4.2 VAJ
> 2.4.3 ???
> 
> 3 How do I test...
> 3.1 public variables and functions?
> 3.2 "friendly"/protected variables and functions?
> 3.3 private variables/functions?
> 3.4 servlets/jsps?
> 3.5 ejb's?
> 3.6 interfaces
> 3.7 Database operations (JDBC)
> 
> 4 Misc.
> 4.1 What are mock objects?
> 4.2 Where can I get more information?
> 
> 
>
